name: XO-Planets - EARLY ACCESS
description:
NOW AVAILABLE ON STEAM!

Frantic rogue-lite platformer with dark-neon and randomly generated planets to explore and destroy.

Annihilate all abominations of xo-planets to protect mankind or just simply destroy everything in your path.

AI RECONNOITERS

FEATURES

  • 25 enemy creatures to annihilate
  • Procedural Level Generation.
  • Randomly generated weapons.
    • 6 different weapon types
    • 3 different enhancements (vampiric, fire, and ice),
    • Possibly over 2,500 different weapons with names
  • Over 25 upgrades to enhance the AI unit (and counting).
  • 5 Bosses to outsmart and eliminate
  • 5 mini bosses (bounty) to kill
  • Randomly generated side missions with nice little random backstory
    • Search and Destroy
    • Bounty Hunter
    • Bomber Man
    • Treasure Hunter
    • Tower Defense


NOW AVAILABLE ON STEAM!
